review.title: “Friendly and flexible but distant and quiet.”
review.pros: Pros – Management is very friendly. They are very open about time off requests.
review.cons: Cons – Very disconnected from management. No feedback as to how good of a job you are doing.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Recognize and provide feedback to employees more frequently.

review.title: “No pay increase at all”
review.pros: Pros – don't ever take the offer. none to mention worthy off
review.cons: Cons – cheap benefits & pay. no amenities at the facility
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Do care for your employees

review.title: “Well managed IT Services with clear vision, solid infrastructure, appreciative clients and healthy culture.”
review.pros: Pros – Training and on-going educationProfessional growthHigh earning potentialQuarterly Meetings for all US Based in Employees -- in California
review.cons: Cons – Not enough time in the day to accomplish all that is possible
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stay the courseContinue to hire top people

review.title: “The job was OK, it paid the bills”
review.pros: Pros – It was a decent job
review.cons: Cons – The health plans were overpriced.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
